verbs.description: [ARG0: pittsburgh] plans to [V: power] [ARG1: itself] [ARG2: with 100 renewable energy] a day after donald trump announced he would withdraw the us from the paris agreement pittsburgh said it aimed to convert to 100 renewable energy by 2035 pittsburgh renewable energy paris illinois donald trump bill peduto
